property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) Power attacker(While attacking, this creature gets +3000 power) +3000 Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into their graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your light creatures. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, tap all your opponent's creatures. Those creatures don't untap at the start of his next turn. Revolution 0 - If you have no shields, your opponent can't summon creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your darkness creatures. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards his hand. Revolution 0 - Whenever this creature attacks, if you have no shields, it breaks all your opponent's shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution - Put on one of your light creatures.
Invasion - Light command that costs 9 (When one of your CONDITIONS attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it)
Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Players can't put creatures into the battle zone except from their hand. When one of your creatures would leave the battle zone, you may discard a Light card that costs 9 from your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution - Put on one of your water creatures.
Invasion - Water command (When one of your CONDITIONS attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it)
​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) This creature can't be blocked. When this creature would leave the battle zone, choose an even number or an odd number. Then your opponent reveals the top card of their deck and puts it on the bottom of their deck. If your choice matches the cost of the card, this creature stays in the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you summon this creature, put any number of creatures from your hand into the battle zone. Your opponent takes an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution - Put on one of your darkness Creatures.
Invasion - Darkness command (When one of your CONDITIONS attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it)
​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When this creature or one of your other creatures is destroyed, if this creature is tapped, destroy one of your opponent's creatures, then return a darkness creature that is not named Galloween, Super Revenge from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your fire creatures. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a fire Dragon, you may put it into the battle zone. Revolution 2 - Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 2 shields or less, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. You may put a fire Dragon from among them into the battle zone. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your fire creatures. Invasion - Fire command(When one of your fire commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) While your opponent has 2 shields or less, this creature can't be destroyed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. It can't cost 0 or less. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures that have 5000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution - Put on one of your nature creatures.
Invasion - Nature evolution command (When one of your CONDITIONS attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it)
Quattro breaker(This creature breaks 4 shields) Whenever this creature or one of your nature creatures would be destroyed, put them into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution - Put on one of your nature creatures.
Invasion - Nature creature that has power 6000 or more (When one of your CONDITIONS attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it)
​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put one of your other creatures into your mana zone. If you do, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put a Mystery Totem or nature Invader from the revealed cards into the battle zone. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ​ {BLOCKER} ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) At the end of each of your turns, untap this creature. Revolution 2 - If you have 2 or less shields, your opponent can't cast spells other than light spells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw 5 cards. Then, discard cards from your hand equal to the amount of your opponent's shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card. Revolution 2 - When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 2 shields or less, return all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone to their owners' hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 8 or more cards in your graveyard, you may shuffle all cards in your graveyard into your deck. If you do, each of your opponent's creatures gets -8000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield. If a shield was returned to your hand, this creature gets +3000 power and 'double breaker' until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures can't attack. Seals can't be removed from creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) While battling, this creature gets +8000 power. While this creature is attacking, your opponent can't put creatures into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your nature creatures gets 'World Breaker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolution 2 - When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 2 shields or less, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put all non-evolution creatures that cost 3 or less into the battle zone and the rest into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: While your opponent has 2 shields or less, you may summon creatures from your mana zone and at the end of your turn, you may return any number of evolution creatures from your mana zone into your hand. Whenever your opponent taps your creatures by one of your opponent's spell effect or creature ability, untap all your creatures.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever this creature attacks, you may add one of your shields to your hand. Then you may add a card from you hand to your shields face down.(You can use the 'shield trigger' of that shield)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your water creatures. Invasion - Water Command(When one of your water commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever your opponent would choose a creature by the effect of a spell, if your opponent has 2 shields or less, your opponent can't choose one of your water creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. Then choose a shield in a shield zone. That shields owner shuffles it into their deck. At the end of the turn, that player puts the top card of his deck into their shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolution 0 Trigger - Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may cast this spell for no cost. Reveal the top card of your deck. If its a water creature, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand. After you cast this spell, shuffle it into your deck instead of your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Revolution 2 - At the end of the turn, if you have 2 shields or less, you may put this creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a non-evolution darkness creature that costs 4 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. At the start of your opponent's next turn, destroy that creature.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have 'blocker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. You may may put an evolution creature from among the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield. You may put a fire Command Dragon that costs 7 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you put this creature into the battle zone or attacks, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone, and choose one of your opponent's shields. Your opponent puts that shield on the bottom of their deck. Then your opponent puts the top card of their deck into their shield face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Reveal the top 6 cards of your deck. Put all evolution creatures from the revealed cards into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Revolution 2 - When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 2 shields or less, you may draw a card. Then you may put a non-evolution creature that costs 5 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you summon this creature, you may reveal an evolution creature in your hand. If you do, this creature costs 2 less to summon. It can't cost 0 or less. At the end of each of your turns, untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put a creature that costs 4 or less into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your light Commands cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less. Mana Arms 3 - If you have 3 light cards in your mana zone, your light Dragons cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Revolution 2 - If you have 2 shields or less, this creature gets 'blocker'.(Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you summon this creature, you may reveal an evolution creature in your hand. If you do, this creature costs 2 less to summon. It can't cost 0 or less. This creature can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a Gachanko Minirobo No.2 from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you summon this creature, you may reveal an evolution creature. If you do, reduce the summoning cost of this creature costs by up to 2. It can't cost 0 or less. Slayer(Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle)

property.value: Return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield. Charger(After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 6 cards of your deck. Put all non-dragon cards on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then put the rest on the top of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Revolution 2 - When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 2 shields or less, choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle.

property.value: Your Revolutionary evolution creatures may cost 1 less to summon for each of your Fire Birds in the battle zone. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a non-evolution creature that costs 7 or less and put it into its owner's mana zone. Revolution 2 - If you have 2 shields or less, this creature gets 'shield trigger'.

property.value: Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. If it's a creature that has power 6000 or more, draw a card.

property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures. Until the start of your next turn, that creature can't attack or block.

property.value: Mana Arms 3 - When your opponent would choose one of your creatures, if you have 3 or more water cards in your mana zone, your opponent can only choose Decoy, Aqua Suicider.(Your other creatures can still be attacked or blocked)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your darkness creatures. Invasion - Darkness creature(When one of your darkness creatures attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it)

property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 3 - Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 3 or more darkness cards in your mana zone, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand.

property.value: This creature can attack untapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Guardman(When one of your other creatures is attacked, you may tap this creature. If you do, the attacking creature will attack this creature instead) Mana Arms 3 - If you have 3 or more nature cards in your mana zone, your nature creatures can't be blocked by creatures that have less power than them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. If it's a Command card, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, one of your other creatures gets +3000 power until the end of the turn.
